Preliminary program for the BBOB 2012 workshop, 7th July 2012.

1st session: 8:30 - 10:20
8:30-9:00 BBOB introduction (AA)
9:00-9:30 P. Pošík “Towards an Adaptive Differential Evolution”
9:30-10:05 T. Schaul “Benchmarking Natural Evolution Strategies”
10:05-10:20 Special Mini-Tutorial (PP)
2nd session: 10:40 - 12:30
10:40-10:55 Turbo-Intro to BBOB and introduction to noisy functions (NH)
10:55-11:35 I. Loshchilov “New surrogate-assisted search control and restart strategies for CMA-ES”
11:40-12:00 M. A. Montes de Oca “An ACO Algorithm Benchmarked on the BBOB Noiseless Function Testbed”
3rd session: 14:00 - 15:50 (short session)
14:00-14:10Turbo-Intro to BBOB and last sessions highlights (VHM)
14:10-14:35 G. Piperagkas “Introducing MEMPSODE to BBOB Competition”
14:40-14:55 V. Melo “Benchmarking the Multi-View Differential Evolution on the Noiseless BBOB-2012 Function Testbed”
Y.-C. Chuang “Black-Box Optimization Benchmarking for Noiseless Function Testbed Using Direction-Based RCGA”
15:00-15:20 Tutorial “What can be learned from the BBOB functions?” (VHM)
4th session: 16:10 - 18:00
16:10-16:40 D. Brockhoff “Weighted Recombination Evolution Strategies with Mirrored Sampling on the Noiseless BBOB Test Bed”
16:45-17:00 Summary of Workshop Results (NN)
17:00-18:00 Panel discussion
